task_summary: The robot pours contents from the cup into a mug using a robotic arm, verifying mug location, executing a precise pouring maneuver, and safely retreating.

task_long_description.overview: This episode involves a manipulator arm executing a controlled pour from a cup into a mug placed on a table. The robot uses visual sensing to confirm the mug's position, moves the cup to an optimal pouring pose above the mug, tilts it to pour at a moderate rate, and finally retreats. The mug and the cup are both present throughout, and there are constraints on arm alignment and safe actuation to avoid spillage or collision.
preconditions: Mug is present and visibly accessible on the table.
Cup is grasped or already held by the robotic arm.
No obstacles between cup and mug.
stepwise_plan: Locate and verify visibility of the mug.
Move the held cup above the mug at a safe offset.
Tilt the cup to pour its contents into the mug.
Return the arm to the initial or a retreat position.
success_criteria: Cup contents are transferred into mug.
Robot retreats to a safe position.
failure_and_recovery: If mug not visible: re-scan or adjust vision.
If pour fails: attempt reposition above mug or retry pour.
If collision detected: stop, retreat and re-evaluate trajectory.
task_long_description.termination: Task completes when pour finished and arm safely retreats.

frame_3.now_evidence: first stable contact and alignment cue visible
frame_3.predicts_next: push actuation expected; confirms goal direction

node_specs.description: Checks if the mug is visible to the robot's sensors.
Moves the held cup above the mug to a safe offset.
Tilts the cup to pour contents into the mug.
Moves the arm away after pouring.

recovery_strategy: Retry mug detection if not visible
Adjust alignment and repeat pour if misaligned
Abort and retreat if collision detected
assumptions: Instruction does not specify the source object, but frames show a cup in the robot gripper pouring into the mug; resolved as source='cup', target='mug'.
Amount to pour is unspecified in both instruction and frames; set as null.
Tilt angle visually estimated as ~45Â°, rounded to closest allowed bin.
Action 'Pour' matches observed robot pour maneuver in frames [3]-[6].

expected_success_criteria: Contents from cup successfully poured into mug
